aka: Following the Traces of the Ephemeral
trans_title: Following the Traces of the Ephemeral
introduction: A journey following the creation of the theatrical costume from the conception of the idea by the costume designer to the final construction by the dressmaker. It follows the setting up of the exhibition “Traces of the ephemeral”, curated for NTNG by Ioulia Stavridou. A film by her students, dedicated to her.
